pages.text: The $(item)Dragon's Breath$() can be obtained by scooping up the $(l:creatures/boss-ender_dragon)$(thing)Ender Dragon's$() breath attack or the purple effect clouds caused by dragon fireballs in an $(item)Empty Bottle$(). $(br2)The $(l:rare/dragons_breath)$(item)Dragon's Breath$() is a brewing item that is used to make $(l:brewing/potion_types#lingering_potion)$(item)Lingering Potions$().
